author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Patatas Bravas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Patatas Bravas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g white potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm cubes
4 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C Heat half the oil in a non-stick frying pan, add the potatoes, and cook, turning frequently, over a medium-low heat for 20 minutes, or until starting to brown. Add the onions and cook for a further 5 minutes.

Add the chilli, sherry, lemon zest, and garlic and allow to reduce for 2 minutes before adding the tomatoes and parsley. Season with salt and black pepper, combine well, and cook over a medium heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the remaining oil, place the whole lot in a shallow baking dish, and cook in the oven for 30 minutes, or until cooked. Serve hot with a selection of tapas dishes.
